title: CryptoWallet12345
author: CryptoWallet12345
content: Hello!So I've come to a recent problem, that I'm getting slowly disabled from every UK bookmaker for basically, gambling too much. I'm under the age of 25, and therefore, in the UK, we have a limit of £500 per month to bet, in the past I used to fake bank statements, wage slips etc, and get huge limits like £5000 per month, but they've cracked down on it to only £500 regardless of earnings.Therefore, I'm looking for a Crypto based bookmaker that would allow a player from the UK, or that would allow me to use a VPN. Stake.com is not an option as the UK site is restricted + the worldwide site says they will ban you if you fail KYS checks. I am looking to bet around £2000-5000 per month, and I like my inplay/live sports, so a fast and big market would be ideal. My favourites have been B365/WilliamHill so if anyone has similar games, that would be great. I used to use CloudBet, but they became restrictive too. I bet on a lot of leagues around the world, Australia/US/France/China etc, even smaller 2nd leagues. Thanks for all the help and suggestions!

comments.body: Quote from: CryptoWallet12345 on October 24, 2022, 03:09:40 PM....I'm a bit surprised, last year, someone from Stake VIP Management DM'ed me on Discord saying they can by pass that, not sure if they were scamming me, or it was some guy who was an affiliate Unsolicited DM + Discord or Telegram = Scammer.It wouldn't make sense for a platform to implement rules they made and bypass them for the sake of a few individuals.
